item.title: [CHD-516] [mobile] Forward does not include original message
item.description:
Summary:
The forward option does not seem to be behaving properly. Unlike through the regular Helpdesk interface where clicking forward visibly includes the original message text (consequently giving you the option to delete it), the mobile interface does not include the original message. Note that you are free to type in your own text or copy/paste the original message in. But if you simply specify the forward address and click forward the resulting forward will be a blank message. I think most users would assume the original is sent without needing to do any extra work.

Steps:
1) Go to the mobile interface in your browser
2) Click into one of your existing tickets
3) Click "Show Full Ticket"
4) Click "Forward"
5) Set "forward to:" towards a test e-mail address
6) Check the body of the forwarded message in your e-mail client

Result:
Original message text is not included in e-mail. So if you didn't type anything into the message textarea before you clicked forward, the message body will be blanked out.
item.summary: [mobile] Forward does not include original message

item.title: [CHD-495] [mobile] Signing off redirects to non-mobile login screen
item.description:
Summary:
Using the mobile URL takes you to a slim login screen when you're logged out but when you sign out you are taken to the standard "large" login screen. I thought it might be nice to see the mobile login again in case you need to get back in.
item.summary: [mobile] Signing off redirects to non-mobile login screen
